ud4.4:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud4.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno kapotakandarāyaṁ viharanti.
ud4.4:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinno hoti aññataraṁ samādhiṁ samāpajjitvā.
ud4.4:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve yakkhā sahāyakā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ gacchanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
ud4.4:2.2: Addasaṁsu kho te yakkhā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinnaṁ.
ud4.4:2.3: Disvāna eko yakkho dutiyaṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.4: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:2.5: Evaṁ vutte, so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.7: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.1: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.2: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.3: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.5: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.6: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.7: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.8: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.10: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:4.1: Atha kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ anādiyitvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṁ adāsi.
ud4.4:4.2: Tāva mahā pahāro ahosi, api tena pahārena sattaratanaṁ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṁ vā nāgaṁ osādeyya, mahantaṁ vā pabbatakūṭaṁ padāleyya.
ud4.4:4.3: Atha ca pana so yakkho “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṁ apatāsi.
ud4.4:5.1: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tena yakkhena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṁ dīyamānaṁ.
ud4.4:5.2: Disvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:5.3: “kacci te, āvuso, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci na kiñci dukkhan”ti?
ud4.4:5.4: “Khamanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:5.5: api ca me sīsaṁ thokaṁ dukkhan”ti.
ud4.4:6.3: Idha te, āvuso sāriputta, aññataro yakkho sīse pahāraṁ adāsi.
ud4.4:6.4: Tāva mahā pahāro ahosi, api tena pahārena sattaratanaṁ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṁ vā nāgaṁ osādeyya, mahantaṁ vā pabbatakūṭaṁ padāleyya, atha ca panāyasmā sāriputto evamāha:
ud4.4:6.5: ‘khamanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:6.6: api ca me sīsaṁ thokaṁ dukkhan’”ti.
ud4.4:7.2: Yāva mahiddhiko āyasmā mahāmoggallāno mahānubhāvo yatra hi nāma yakkhampi passissati.
ud4.4:8.1: Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya tesaṁ ubhinnaṁ mahānāgānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
ud4.4:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
